name: Do a Dice Roll!
description:
Do a Dice Roll!

Steer a dice-shaped plane through an endless tunnel full of spikey dice and deadly laser walls!

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Note: only Xbox controllers have been tested, and controllers may not work at all if you play in the web browser.

How to Play

- Use the arrow keys, WASD, or joystick to steer the plane.

- Hold shift, space, or controller face buttons while moving to the side to perform a sideways DICE ROLL.

- Touch the ground to begin rolling on the ground.

     Dodge spikey dice and red walls. Spikey dice deal a damage amount depending on their rotation. Collect red recovery dice to replenish your health. Your speed is determined by the amount of dots on the back of your plane at any given time. This means that as your plane rolls around your speed will change!

     Your goal is to survive as long as possible, to achieve the highest possible score. As part of a cruel experiment to see how long the pilot can survive without being diced into pieces!
